name: Forex School - Learn Forex Trading Basics
description: Learn Forex Basics, Forex Trading Currencies & Forex Rules - ALL-IN-ONE app for FREE  Forex School is changing the way people learn & start making money from the Foreign Exchange (FX) market!   Its free, for real.   Its fun. Are you bored at reading Forex trading guides or tutorials? NOT ANYMORE!   Its effective. Enjoy the learning by reading bite-sized lessons followed by review questions.  Reading, Learning and Enjoying ANYTIME & ANYWHERE without the Internet connection!  Forex School is a comprehensive guide to learn to invest in the Forex Market. The lessons in Forex School are fast, easy, and effective; each course is set up to be completed in less than two or three hours. No prior experience is needed.  Forex School covers the following topics:  Introduction to Currency Trading What is Forex Trading? Reading a Forex Quote and Understanding the Jargon Foreign Exchange Risk and Benefits Forex History and Market Participants Economic Theories, Models, Feeds & Data Fundamental Analysis & Fundamentals Trading Strategies Technical Analysis & TechnicaI Indicators How To Trade & Open A Forex Account Trading Strategies Ways To Trade The Four Major Pairs The EUR/USD The USD/JPY The GBP/USD The USD/CHF Commodity Pairs (USD/CAD, USD/AUD, USD/NZD) Currency Cross Rates Emerging Market Currencies 12 Forex Trading Rules
